text: Lyndall Dale "Lindy" McDaniel (December 13, 1935 - November 14, 2020) was an American right-handed relief pitcher in Major League Baseball who had a 21-year career from 1955 to 1975. He played for the St. Louis Cardinals, Chicago Cubs, San Francisco Giants, New York Yankees and Kansas City Royals. McDaniel was born in Hollis, Oklahoma. McDaniel died of COVID-19 on November 14, 2020 in Carrollton, Texas at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:St. Louis Cardinals players Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:San Francisco Giants players Category:New York Yankees players Category:Kansas City Royals players Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Texas Category:Sportspeople from Oklahoma
title: Lindy McDaniel
